Dry cleaning standard items\nThis includes: Trousers, Slacks, Jackets, Vests, Skirts, Jumpers, Ties, Blouses
Dry cleaning not standard items as per a list.\nThis includes: Full length coats, Dresses, Doonas, Bedspreads
Pickup and Delivery: Free for orders over $20
Pickup and Delivery: For orders below $20
Pick up and drop off times are not valid.
Please choose pickup date and time.
Please choose drop off date and time.
You have a pending order. You can not make multiple orders. Please try again after completion of the current order.
This order doesn\'t has a bill or is not in valid format.
HOW DO YOU RATE OUR SERVICE?
HOW DO YOU RATE OUR PRICE?
HOW DO YOU RATE OUR TIMING?

After creating an account, you will be able to select your locatioin, whether you have dry cleaning and shirts to be ironed or just laundry, and choose pickup and drop off times which are convenient for you.

A wash mate will arrive at your door at the chosen time. If this is your first time, they will provide the laundry bags - one for dry cleaning and shirts to be ironed, and another for everything else. Place you clothes in these bags and hand back to you wash mate.

Your clothes will be taken to our eco-friendly laundry facilities where they will be cleaned to the highest standard, folded and placed back in the laundry bag for a wash mate to deliver to your door. Your account will be automatically charged, and an invoice emailed. You can keep the laundry bags, making it easier for subsequent pickups.
